description:
## Reference Registration

Register references (publications) that describe models or model components.

**All references MUST have a DOI.**

If a reference has no DOI, obtain one via [Zenodo](https://zenodo.org) first.

label: DOI URLs
description: Enter DOI URLs, one per line.\n\n**Must start with https://doi.org/**

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
